author: Richard Eldred
description:
The Free Speech Union is celebrating a major win after helping ex-cop Julian Foulkes secure £20,000 from Kent Police after they wrongly arrested him over a lawful tweet about rising antisemitism.

The post Free Speech Union Scores Victory as Ex-Cop Wins £20,000 Over ‘Thought Crime’ Arrest appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Free Speech Union Scores Victory as Ex-Cop Wins £20,000 Over ‘Thought Crime’ Arrest

author: Richard Eldred
description:
In a damning report, the UN has slammed UK police for allowing criminals to choose their gender, warning that it undermines protections for women and girls, distorts rape statistics and erases vital data on male violence.

The post ‘Stop Letting Criminals Choose Their Own Gender’, UN Warns After UK Police Forces Allow 49 Rapists to Identify As Female Offenders appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: ‘Stop Letting Criminals Choose Their Own Gender’, UN Warns After UK Police Forces Allow 49 Rapists to Identify As Female Offenders

author: Richard Eldred
description:
We might've won the Cold War, but Britain's now sliding into soft totalitarianism, warns Sam Ashworth-Hayes in the Telegraph, as state control, high taxes and strong-armed conformity erode our hard-won freedoms.

The post Britain Is Sleepwalking Into Total State Control of Our Daily Lives appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Britain Is Sleepwalking Into Total State Control of Our Daily Lives

author: Richard Eldred
description:
Benefits to households with foreign nationals have soared to £941 million a month, doubling in three years and now consuming over 15% of all Universal Credit payments.

The post Foreigners Claim £1 Billion a Month in Benefits appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Foreigners Claim £1 Billion a Month in Benefits

author: Richard Eldred
description:
The harrowing case of a Christian asylum seeker allegedly obstructed by an Islamic network within the Home Office has raised urgent questions about bias, internal influence and systemic failures in Britain's asylum system.

The post Did Muslim Home Office Staff Block Persecuted Christian Woman’s Asylum Claim? appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Did Muslim Home Office Staff Block Persecuted Christian Woman’s Asylum Claim?

author: Chris Morrison
description:
Sky News' latest climate scare story – full of contradictions and misleading claims – perfectly illustrates the desperate collapse of the Net Zero fantasy, says the Daily Sceptic's Environment Editor.

The post Basic Physics All at Sea in Sky News Climate Scare Nonsense Story appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Basic Physics All at Sea in Sky News Climate Scare Nonsense Story

author: Paul Homewood
description:
The Independent's John Rentoul's £6 billion Net Zero claim, aimed at rubbishing Nigel Farage's £40 billion estimate, is torn apart by Paul Homewood – who shows the real cost could be double that, at £80 billion a year.

The post John Rentoul’s Fake Cost of Net Zero appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: John Rentoul’s Fake Cost of Net Zero
